page.title: 06A Day in the Rector's Life.
page.content: Mr.Herrick the Rector is English but speaks Welsh fluently.He learnt Welsh when he studied at St.David's University Lampeter. He wakes at 6 am and gets dressed.He then takes his dog for a walk.At about 6:30 he reads the Bible and prays until breakfast at 8:00. After breakfast he goes to his study where he reads and writes until lunch at 12:30.After lunch he visits his parishioners,especially the sick and elderly.He enjoys visiting people. When he returns to the Rectory he has his tea and relaxes for a short time before he attends meetings. On Monday evening he runs a children's club called The Explorers.After his evening work he's tired and ready for a rest.
